Jx.Panel.FileUpload

Extends: Jx.Panel

This class extends Jx.Panel to provide a consistent interface for uploading files in an application.

Locale Keys

  • upload.buttonText

Summary
Jx.Panel.FileUploadExtends: Jx.Panel
Options
fileAn object containing the options for Jx.Field.File
onFileCompleteAn event handler that is called when a file has been uploaded
onCompleteAn event handler that is called when all files have been uploaded
prompt
removeOnCompleteDetermines whether a file is removed from the queue after uploading

Options

file

An object containing the options for Jx.Field.File

onFileComplete

An event handler that is called when a file has been uploaded

onComplete

An event handler that is called when all files have been uploaded

prompt

The prompt to display at the top of the panelbefore the file input

removeOnComplete

Determines whether a file is removed from the queue after uploading

Extends: Jx.Widget
